message_1: Identify the isotope notation for an atom that has 8 protons and 9 neutrons.
message_2: The isotope notation for an atom with 8 protons and 9 neutrons is 17O (Oxygen-17). The atomic number (number of protons) is represented by the symbol O, and the mass number (sum of protons and neutrons) is written as a superscript to the left of the symbol.
